titles.title: To waive temporarily the Medicaid enrollment composition rule for Managed Health Services of Wisconsin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 9/11/1996--Introduced. Waives for contract periods through December 31, 1999, with respect to Managed Health Services of Wisconsin, the requirement under the Social Security Act that Medicare and Medicaid beneficiaries under titles XVIII and XIX of that Act constitute less than 75 percent of the membership of a participating health maintenance organization.
